column1: Poppy was the daughter of [[Falco Chubb-Baggins]]. She married [[Filibert Bolger]]. She was a guest at [[Bilbo's Farewell Party]].<ref>{{App

column2: Poppy]]'' is a common family of annual and perennial plants. The name derives from [[Old English]] ''popæg'', ultimately from Latin ''papaver''.
